product-disclaimer: Wɔakyerɛw nneɛma ne nnwuma sɛ ɛyɛ mmerɛw ma Ethereum mpɔtam. Adeɛ anaa dwumadie bi a wɔde bɛka ho nkyerɛ sɛ wɔagye atom a ɛfiri ethereum.org wɛbsaet kuo no hɔ, anaa Ethereum Foundation hɔ.

site-description: Ethereum yɛ wiase nyinaa efidie, a wɔde ahyɛ aman nsa, ma sika ne kɔmputa application foforɔ ahorow. Wɔ Ethereum so no, wobɛtumi akyerɛw code a ɛhwɛ sika so, na w'asisi kɔmputa applications a wobɛtumi akɔ so wɔ wiase baabiara.
